summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity for an account associated with Epstein Virgin Islands from December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and investment holdings, highlighting significant losses in equities and providing insights into the management of the account. This document contains financial disclosures and account summaries related to the Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, detailing account activity, investment holdings, and terms of arbitration agreements. It outlines the financial status of the account over a specified period, including deposits, withdrawals, and income generated from investments. This document appears to be a financial statement related to accounts held by Jeffrey Epstein, detailing account balances, transactions, and investment holdings for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes information about securities, cash deposits, and the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. It includes information about account balances, transactions, and disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. The document highlights various financial activities and the management of Epstein's investments during a specified period. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to the account of Jeffrey Epstein, detailing transactions, portfolio holdings, and investment activities for the period of August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It includes information about cash withdrawals, deposits, dividends, and interest income, as well as the role of Pershing LLC as the clearing broker for Epstein's account. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts, detailing transactions, realized gains and losses, and important disclosures regarding investment practices. It includes information on securities transactions, cash withdrawals, and the management of accounts, emphasizing the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing the portfolio holdings and transactions of an account associated with Epstein in the Virgin Islands for the period of June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It includes information on realized gains and losses, account balances, and transactions involving various securities. This document appears to be a financial statement related to accounts held by Jeffrey Epstein, detailing account balances, transactions, and investment holdings for the period of May 1, 2017, to May 31, 2017. It includes information about various securities, cash balances, and investment performance, as well as disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document contains financial records related to transactions and account management for an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It includes details on portfolio holdings, realized gains and losses, and various financial disclosures. The document highlights transactions involving securities, cash withdrawals, and income from investments. This document contains financial information related to Jeffrey Epstein's portfolio holdings, including details on securities, dividends, and cash transactions for the period of March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It outlines the performance of various investments and provides disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for an account associated with Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, detailing account activity, holdings, and transactions for February 2017. It includes information on dividends, interest, and the overall portfolio performance, highlighting significant financial figures and transactions. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including account balances, transactions, and investment holdings for the period of January 1, 2017, to January 31, 2017. It details realized gains and losses, as well as disclosures regarding the management of the accounts by Pershing LLC. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC, detailing account information and disclosures related to securities transactions. It includes important information about the role of Pershing as a clearing broker and outlines arbitration agreements. The document is marked confidential and includes references to Epstein and the Virgin Islands.
